carrying.name: (a shot glass from the Flirting Puppy)
(a shot glass from the Flirting Puppy)
(a shot glass from the Flirting Puppy)
(a shot glass from the Flirting Puppy)

mobs.long_desc: A common man walks up and down the street, staring blankly at nothing.
mobs.desc: As you look at the common man you notice that he is just staring into space. He's not really looking at anything, just looking up really.  He looks as though he doesn't have a care in the world.  You try to get his attention but your efforts are futile, this man has obviously lost his senses.

mobs.long_desc: A statue, seemingly made out of liquid, is guarding this spot.
mobs.desc: You look at this statue, and wonder what magic could have made this wonderful spectacle.  Its solid looking body is very deceptive as its movements are quick and precise.  A conflict with it might not be a good idea.

mobs.long_desc: A woman is here screaming her lungs out.
mobs.desc: You see a woman who is screaming!  Her scream is very piercing, and is starting to hurt your ears.  You try to get her to stop but the incessant need to scream is controlling every fiber of her being.  What could have been so horrible to make someone scream so?

mobs.long_desc: A common child is here, staring at you with both of its heads!
mobs.desc: There is a small child here, staring at you with it's two heads!  You take a look at this abomination of nature and wonder how such a creature could come to be.  The child glares at you, as though you were its next meal!

mobs.long_desc: An old man wanders around town mumbling to himself.
mobs.desc: This old man looks as though he has been to many far away lands. You notice that he carries interesting but essentially worthless trinkets about his person. The man now wanders around Nordus, just talking to himself about nothing in particular.

mobs.keywords: bloody mass organ pile guts parts body
mobs.long_desc: Bloody, a living pile of guts and body parts, guards his home.
mobs.desc: Bloody, who once was a powerful warrior in town, is now reduced to a pile of intestines, kidneys, bones and other human organs and body parts.  What kind of horrific thing could do this to someone?  Bloody does not look as though he is going anywhere, and he is guarding his home from any intruders.

mobs.long_desc: Krandor the armorer stands here staring into nothingness.
mobs.desc: Krandor looks to be a powerful man.  His large size and muscular build makes you think twice about opposing him.  Right now though, he is just standing here looking into space, at absolutely nothing.  What has happened to him?

mobs.long_desc: A small man stands here, laughing at nothing at all.
mobs.desc: You look at this short man who holds a very large meat hook. This man just stands here laughing and laughing.  You wonder what is causing this immense laughing fit.  Your attempts to get his attention all fail and he continues to laugh aloud.  What an insane little man!

mobs.long_desc: A small slimy skinned beast is here drooling profusely.
mobs.desc: A small disgusting looking beast is here drooling all over the floor.  This creature looks as though it has been here for a while, as the puddle of saliva beneath it is pretty large.  It stares at you as though you are its next meal. Horrid thoughts of this beast encroach into your mind, and you feel compelled to leave this place immediately.

mobs.keywords: man fintazz weaponer fintazz middle aged
mobs.long_desc: A middle-aged man is here, trying to fend off some imaginary enemies.
mobs.desc: You look at the man and see that he doesn't exactly have all the necessary ingredients to bake a cake with.  He is trying to fend off some imaginary enemies, and in the process he is taking everything with him.   He looks to be very scared of something, almost as though he really can see a threat. The man spots you and you get the feeling that you could be in trouble...

mobs.keywords: rana theroxa ranatheroxa man lord handsome
mobs.long_desc: Rana Theroxa, Lord of Nordus, is here banging his head against the wall.
mobs.desc: You look at the Lord of Nordus and think to yourself, this man, who now bangs his head against the wall, once ruled this land?  What has happened to this once great man?  Rana Theroxa is a tall handsome man, with bulging muscles, a healthy build and a full head of auburn hair.  As you step closer, he stops and turns his attention towards you!  His face turns red with rage, and he peers deep into your soul, making you cringe in fear, this is a massive man!

mobs.long_desc: An old mage stands here, unaffected by the madness.
mobs.desc: You look at this old mage and see nothing but bone.  This man is very scrawny and skimpy.  He looks as though a weak gust of wind could knock him over. Aranahir seems to be unaffected by what is going on around you, as he is walking around his shop doing miscellaneous tasks.  Overall he looks to be pretty normal.. You try and get his attention but he is much too busy to pay attention to you.  As you walk near him, he turns toward you, and you find that you have been mistaken!  Aranahir has no FACE!  Where his face should be there is nothing.  Just a void that his hood was doing well to hide.  You can hear strange and evil incarnations coming from the void and you realize that trouble is on the way, as he speaks some jargon and points at you.

mobs.long_desc: A crazed survivor hides here, paranoid and waiting to attack.
mobs.desc: You can see that this man has been unaffected by the magic around you. He seems to be sane, yet extremely paranoid.  Being the only unaffected person by the magic that has landed like a blanket over this Village, he is noticeably worked up and looks as though he may attack you at any moment.

mobs.long_desc: You can sense a darkness moving around the room here.
mobs.desc: As you look at the darkness, you notice that it is alive.  When you look closer, the shadow tried to stop moving to fool you, but your keen senses show you the truth.  The shadow seems to be keeping its distance from you, almost as if it's scared of you.

mobs.long_desc: Luchiaans works busily on his new formula for unlimited powers!
mobs.desc: Luchiaans is dressed in a red robe that has a glowing hue.  He is of average build, and really doesn't look to be too much of a challenge.  Luchiaans knows of your presence in the room, but he ignores you, as if you are a fly on the wall.  BOOM!  You see a large explosion, and then a million little bugs fly around the room, and then disappear in mid air.  Maybe he is a little bit more than what he looks to be.  This whole town, after all, is in shambles, and you get the feeling that Luchiaans is the source.

mobs.long_desc: A small slimy skinned beast is here drooling profusely.
mobs.desc: A small disgusting looking beast is here drooling all over the floor.  This creature looks as though it has been here for a while, as the puddle of saliva beneath it is pretty large.  It starts at you as though you are its next meal. Horrid thoughts of this beast encroach into your mind, and you feel compelled to leave this place immediately.

mobs.long_desc: A common man walks up and down the street, looking at nothing in particular.
mobs.desc: As you look at the common man you notice that he is just staring into space. He's not really looking at anything, just looking up really.  He looks as though he doesn't have a care in the world.  You try and get his attention but your efforts are futile, this man has obviously lost his senses.

mobs.long_desc: A woman is here screaming her lungs out.
mobs.desc: You see a woman who is screaming!  Her scream is very piercing, and is starting to hurt your ears.  You try and get her to stop but the incessant need to scream is controlling every fiber of her being.  What could have been so horrible to make someone scream so?

mobs.long_desc: A common child is here, staring at you with both of its heads!
mobs.desc: There is a small child here, staring at you with its two heads!  You take a look at this abomination of nature and wonder how such a creature could come to be.  The child glares at you, as though you were its next meal!

mobs.long_desc: A statue, seemingly made out of liquid is guarding this spot.
mobs.desc: You look at this statue, and wonder what magic could have made this wonderful spectacle.  Its solid looking body is very deceptive as its movements are quick and precise.  A conflict with it might not be a good idea.

mobs.long_desc: A common man sits here at the bar, staring at his drink.
mobs.desc: As you look at the common man you notice that he is just staring into space. He's not really looking at anything, just looking up really.  He looks as though he doesn't have a care in the world.  You try and get his attention but your efforts are futile, this man has obviously lost his senses.

mobs.long_desc: A statue, seemingly made out of liquid, is guarding this spot.
mobs.desc: You look at this statue, and wonder what magic could have made this wonderful spectacle.  Its solid looking body is very deceptive as its movements are quick and precise.  A conflict with it might not be a good idea.

mobs.long_desc: You can sense a darkness moving around the room here.
mobs.desc: As you look at the darkness, you notice that it is alive.  When you look closer, the shadow tried to stop moving to fool you, but your keen senses show you the truth.  The shadow seems to be keeping its distance from you, almost as if it's scared of you.

mobs.long_desc: A common child is here, staring at you with both of its heads!
mobs.desc: There is a small child here, staring at you with it's two heads!  You take a look at this abomination of nature and wonder how such a creature could come to be.  The child glares at you, as though you were its next meal!

mobs.long_desc: A large demon is here phasing in and out of reality.
mobs.desc: As you look at the demon you notice that it lacks a state of being. It looks as though it has been ripped from its reality and is trying to get back.  The demon slowly phases in and out of this and another reality. It looks as though it will do anything to get back...Anything.

mobs.long_desc: A spirit priest stands before you.
mobs.desc: This priest was honoured by being made the guardian of the book of healing and he does not intend to let anyone make a fool of him.

mobs.long_desc: A beautiful multicoloured bird hovers here watching you.
mobs.desc: All the colours of the rainbow shimmer across the plumage of this fantastic creature, filling the room with reflections.  The bird seems aware of your purpose here and is watching you closely as it hovers.

objects.ground: A flimsy looking key lies here.

extras.text: This key, although very flimsy, is under the influence of magic.  As you hold it in your hand the key expands to fit the contours of your hand.  You imagine the key would be able to expand into a keyhole and allow you to unlock a door.

objects.short: a shot glass from the Flirting Puppy
objects.ground: One of the Flirting Puppy Pub's shot glasses lies on the ground here.

extras.text: You see a shot glass made of very thick glass.  It's from the notorious Flirting Puppy Pub.  Its fine quality makes it a collector's item.

objects.ground: A key made of hardened wax lies here.

extras.text: As you look at the key, you notice it's made entirely of wax. Even though the key is made of wax, it magically hardened and won't break even under the most intense pressure you can apply.

objects.short: a large rank-smelling bag of gristle
objects.ground: A discarded leather bag is here, stinking up the area.

extras.text: You look in the putrid smelling bag.  It smells horrid and it's filled with gristle.  It's not gourmet food, but there's a huge portion inside and it will keep you full for a while.

objects.ground: A key made from a giant pearl lies here.

extras.text: This key was crafted out of a giant pearl and then buffed to a high shine. The key looks incredibly sturdy and could stand up to a lot of abuse. It is probably worth a lot of money.

objects.ground: A beautiful key crafted out of opal lies here.

extras.text: You see a key made out of opal.  This beautiful key lures your eyes up and down the length of it, almost entrancing you.  Its beauty is overwhelming; you wish you could keep it forever.

objects.ground: Two balls of ice lie here, casting a magical glow of light all around.

extras.text: As you look closer at the pair of eyes, you notice that they glow from the inside out.  Although they are made out of ice, they are not melting or exceedingly cold to the touch.  If you held them, they could probably be used as a light source.

objects.ground: There is a small coil of leather drying in the sun here.

extras.text: This small coil of leather with a metal spike on the end could be used as a whip in close combat.  It's very sturdy and could probably go through many battles without harm.

objects.ground: A small vial lies partially hidden on the ground.

extras.text: The vial is crafted of fine glass. It's not very big; it couldn't hold much liquid.. There is an insignia on the vial that suggests that the vial is from Nordus.

objects.ground: A ripple of water shaped into a shield lies here waiting for an owner.

extras.text: As you look closer you notice that the shield isn't entirely clear; there is a light liquid filling the inside of the shield that is constantly in motion. As hits are taken, the filling liquid moves and reacts, giving great protection from attacks.

objects.ground: A colorful rainbow reflects some color into your eyes.

extras.text: You look at this wondrous piece of weaponry.  It's as hard as steel, but it's light and versatile.  It has a comfortable grip, you feel like you are holding on to, well a rainbow.  It's light opacity almost lets you see right through the axe and the marvelous colors shine through.  Reds, greens, purples and soft white colors seem to warm you as you hold this great weapon.  It had to have been crafted by magical means, and you take time to admire its craftsmanship, as well as quality.

objects.ground: A piece of tattered cloth lies discarded on the ground.

extras.text: You see an old tattered piece of cloth.  It's very beaten up and has been through many generations of owners.  You can feel it's age as you bring it near you.  Something about this cloth makes you feel just a little bit more knowledgeable.  You briefly wonder who first wove this old shawl.

objects.ground: A hook used for hanging meat is here.

extras.text: Blood drips from the tip of this large hook, as though it was recently used. The large size of this hook, makes it a formidable weapon.  You feel a tingling sensation when you hold it in your hands, and feel much weaker and have much less energy.

objects.ground: A shiny and smooth piece of cloth is here, radiating a warm and inviting aura.

extras.text: As you look at the cape, you notice that it is very shiny, almost a shine like that of metal.  The silk is of fine quality and seems to withstand anything that is thrown its way.  As you bring it closer to you, you notice that it has a soft glowing aura, that makes you feel invigorated and stronger.  This cape surely is magical in nature.

objects.ground: A long staff lies here, stirring up some blustery wind.

extras.text: As you bring the staff closer to you, you notice a wind generate around you almost as though it was protecting you.  The staff makes you feel more agile, and gives you en energy boost when you hold it!

objects.ground: A small lavender colored key lies here.

extras.text: You can see a small key that has a beautiful shade of lavender covering its surface.  The key is warm to the touch and has perfectly round edges. It was surely crafted by a master key-maker.

objects.ground: A yummy looking piece of candy is here begging to be eaten!

extras.text: This piece of candy is small and wonderfully wrapped.  It emits a sweet aroma that fills your senses with joy, you can hardly wait to open this treat and let your taste buds do the talking!

objects.short: a small piece of petrified magic
objects.ground: A small chunk of glittering material is here changing colors.

extras.text: As you gaze at this remarkably heavy material you feel invigorated and more alive!  The material glows and hums softly while giving off a slight trace of smoke that smells sweet like candy.

objects.ground: A large arch of stone stands in the middle of the room.
A slender volume entitled 'Ciphers and Magic for the Novice' lies here.

extras.text: Some of the pages seem to be marked, in particular page16 and page37 which talk about future directions for more powerful spellcasters and how to encode a simple cipher respectively. The preface briefly states how essential it is for a spellcaster to protect his spells against accidental or deliberate theft, by encoding them.

A passage has been circled on this page, it reads: ...so in order to ensure that the magic user has a copious supply of willing subjects for his experiments, he must first ingratiate himself with his chosen town by generous acts. An intelligent mage will try and get himself accepted into the council, and perhaps even move for a law which can be used to aid him. This could state that all mad people be locked up, or all criminals be killed. We all know how easy it is to turn a mind to madness and the mage may then take these subjects 'under his protection' and experiment on them without worry, as the populace soon forget what has happened to them... There is also a note in the margin which seems to be a calculation of some sort and a reference to page23.

Ack, its a recipe for unlimited power, but it involves several unsavoury ingredients including human organs. A passage has been circled on this page too, and it reads: ...obviously in order to get this many human hearts is impossible which is why this spell still remains theoretical, although if one were to perfect some sort of cloning technique, coupled with a spell for creation of a human, then it might be possible to create a human with many vestigial organs which would presumably still be valid for the recipe... Your skin crawls as you continue to read, anyone who really thought this sort of stuff would work would have to be mad right?

There are some simple ciphers on the page here, and some notes in the margin which look like the would have continued onto page 38, only that page has been torn out of the book! You read the notes anyway and puzzle over the missing data: ...and as has been known through history the simplest cipher is a substitution whereby one letter is substituted for another (for example the next letter in the alphabet) and the message is rewritten. The decoder knows that the letters are shifted by a certain number of positions and can easily decode the message. This is known as a monoalphabetic cipher. A more complex 'polyalphabetic' cipher such as the Vigenere cipher may also be used. The illustration on the next page shows this in action, but basically the implementation is as follows: 1) the keyword is chosen and repeatedly written below the phrase to be encoded 2) the combination of keyword letter and phrase letter are used to index  the Vigenere tableau 3) the indexed letters form the encoded phrase And the decryption works in reverse, going down the column indexed by the keyword letter to the encoded letter, and determining which letter heads that row. Obviously a keyword of all 'a' would not encrypt at all. The page ends here!
Unfortunately, this page has been ripped from the book.

objects.ground: It looks like a page from a book has been torn out and left here.

extras.text: The page has a large table of letters on it that look like this: ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ BCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZA CDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZAB DEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZABC EFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZABCD FGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZABCDE GHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZABCDEF HIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZABCDEFG IJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZABCDEFGH JKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZABCDEFGHI KLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZABCDEFGHIJ LMNOPQRSTUVWXYZABCDEFGHIJK MNOPQRSTUVWXYZABCDEFGHIJKL NOPQRSTUVWXYZABCDEFGHIJKLM OPQRSTUVWXYZABCDEFGHIJKLMN PQRSTUVWXYZABCDEFGHIJKLMNO QRSTUVWXYZABCDEFGHIJKLMNOP RSTUVWXYZABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQ STUVWXYZABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQR TUVWXYZABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRS UVWXYZABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRST VWXYZABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTU WXYZABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUV XYZABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVW YZABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWX ZABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXY there is also some writing below this table as follows: this is the phrase keyk ey key keykey DLGCM QDLCZ LPKWC DLGCM QDLCZ LPKWC keyke ykeyk eykey THISI STHEP HRASE There is a page number below this, Page 38. You turn the page over and are confronted with the logical inconsistency 'This page intentionally left blank' yeesh..

objects.ground: A large engraved glass display case stands solidly in the centre of the room.

extras.text: The engravings are so dense on the case that you can see nothing inside which kind of defeats the purpose of the case you feel.
It seems to be some ancient spell of containment. As you examine the construction of the spell you realise that somehow you know the way to collapse the magic and open the case.
You see that if you can determine the name of the spell writer, you only need to say their name backwards to collapse the spell.
Heh, you were right, the creator couldn't resist signing their masterpiece! It says here 'Glass engraved by Rufiaans to a pattern supplied by Shema'.

objects.ground: A large old book lies here.

extras.text: This is no ordinary book, this is the book of healing that for centuries has kept Nordus free of plagues and serious illnesses.  The whole book is magical, and you can see a piece of it is missing.  That little piece would probably protect the holder against most spells, the whole book can protect a town against all but the most concerted attacks.

objects.ground: A large old book lies here.

extras.text: This is no ordinary book, this is the book of healing that for centuries has kept Nordus free of plagues and serious illnesses.  The whole book is magical, and there are records of how its power prevented the village of Nordus being overcome by plagues on several occasions.

objects.ground: A small pink statue stands here.

extras.text: This small statue actually looks to be made of flesh - or at least has had human skin wrapped over it.

objects.ground: A small grey statue lies here.

extras.text: The statue looks like a stone carving of a sleeping person.

objects.ground: A pair of thick gloves made of a powdery white fabric lie here.

extras.text: These gloves seem very thick and would probably protect the wearer from heat. Most useful for a smith or armourer.  They seem to give off small puffs of white powder when they are beaten though?
Hmm, the white powder seems to be asbestos.  Lovely.  Course with your lifestyle I wouldn't think that would be the cause of your demise >;-)

objects.ground: A pile of ashes lies here.
A slightly charred lump of flesh lies here.
A small green statue lies here.

extras.text: It looks like a regular person except without a mouth.

objects.ground: A plain steel key lies here.
A small battered chest sits in the middle of the room.

extras.text: As you look closer at the chest you notice that it seems to be firmly attached to the floor.  You try and release it but you cannot seem to free it.  The chest is very tattered and worn down but it is sturdy anyhow.   You look at the chest a second time and notice that there's a small engraving on it.
You look at then engraving and notice that there is a mere one word on it. The word "TELEPORT" is engraved deeply into the side of the chest.

objects.ground: A small box with intricate carvings sits alone here.

extras.text: This box can't be more than 2 inches square.  You can't make out what any of the carvings mean, but the box seems to hold some importance as there was a lot of time and effort put into the making of this box.

objects.ground: A small silver chest is here softly glowing.

extras.text: This chest is beautiful.  There are designs in the chest that suggest that a lot of craftsmanship went into its making.  The chest alone must be worth a fortune!  Unfortunantely, you can't seem to pick the heavy chest up. There is a small square-shaped hole in the back of the chest.
This small square shaped hole, looks like it could be used to open this chest. But a square key?  Nonsense!

objects.ground: A ball of bright light is enclosed in an orb of glass.

extras.text: This small ball of light is giving off an immense amount of light.  It is enclosed in some type of a glass orb that seems to keep the outside of the ball cool to the touch and manageable.  The inside glows like a small sun, radiating bright light in all directions.  If you have this item, luck, determination and the Gods are with you.

objects.ground: A pile of coins is here.
A small floppy piece of skin lies here.

extras.text: How grotesque.  Some person's face - sex now indistinguishable - was stripped to provide this awful covering.  No hairs remain on it anywhere, and it has been tanned to prevent deterioration and to give it a supple, smooth feel. The eyelids are missing, and small strings are attached which go around the wearer's ears.

triggers.name: Pawn Shop (Nordus)
triggers.commands: * switch on the global variable which was set when they entered set flagit 0 switch %chosen% case 1 if %speech% == floor phrase is open sesame set flagit 1 endif break case 2 if %speech% == floor phrase is eingang bitte set flagit 1 endif break case 3 if %speech% == floor phrase is traverser dedans set flagit 1 endif break case 4 if %speech% == floor phrase is let me in dorkus set flagit 1 endif break done if %flagit% == 1 wecho The ground begins to rumble and the dirt begins to part. wdoor 51030 d room 51075 wdoor 51030 d description You see flashes of colour in the darkness below...this looks unnatural. wait 7 s wecho The ground again begins to tremble as the passageway dissolves. wait 5 s wecho The floor returns to normal without a trace of the secret it holds. wdoor 51030 d purge endif

triggers.name: maze_room_one
triggers.commands: if %exitdone% != 1 * flag to prevent group members retriggering set exitdone 1 global exitdone wdoor %self.vnum% north purge wdoor %self.vnum% south purge wdoor %self.vnum% west purge wdoor %self.vnum% east purge wdoor %self.vnum% up purge wdoor %self.vnum% down purge set exitsreq %random.6% set exitsdone 0 while %exitsdone% < %exitsreq set exitdir %random.6% eval toroom 51071 + %random.5% if %toroom% != %self.vnum% switch %exitdir% case 1 wdoor %self.vnum% north room %toroom% wdoor %self.vnum% north description The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it. eval exitsdone %exitsdone% + 1 break case 2 wdoor %self.vnum% south room %toroom% wdoor %self.vnum% south description The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it. eval exitsdone %exitsdone% + 1 break case 3 wdoor %self.vnum% east room %toroom% wdoor %self.vnum% east description The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it. eval exitsdone %exitsdone% + 1 break case 4 wdoor %self.vnum% west room %toroom% wdoor %self.vnum% west description The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it. eval exitsdone %exitsdone + 1 break case 5 wdoor %self.vnum% up room %toroom% wdoor %self.vnum% up description The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it. eval exitsdone %exitsdone + 1 break case 6 wdoor %self.vnum% down room %toroom% wdoor %self.vnum% down description The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it. eval exitsdone %exitsdone% + 1 break done endif done * now add a special case which exits from the maze totally if %random.100% < 30 wdoor %self.vnum% up room 51077 wdoor %self.vnum% up description This doorway looks more solid than the others. endif wait 1 s unset exitdone endif

triggers.name: set_encrytped_phrase
triggers.commands: if %running% != "yes" set running yes global running unset chosen set chosen %random.4% global chosen * we have 4 known phrases..it would be nice if this were completely dynamic though :) switch %chosen% case 1 set descr PLTWK ZHWIL OIXWI ONXML KMJ break case 2 set descr PLTWK ZHWIL OIXMB XGFVZ LIYBX break case 3 set descr PLTWK ZHWIL OIXBK KVJZL ORIMW KNX break case 4 set descr PLTWK ZHWIL OIXTX DMJQG NOWSN C break done wdoor 51030 n description %descr% wait 2 s unset running endif

triggers.name: luchiaans_greeting
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 && %actor.level% < 100 if (%actor.class% /= Necromancer || %actor.class% /= Sorcerer) && %magequest% < 2 wait 5 ponder wait 2 s mechoaround %actor% Luchiaans leans close to %actor.name%. whisper %actor.name% You and I could be partners in this, if you want? I could use an extra pair of hands. endif if %actor.class% /= Warrior wait 5 ponder wait 2 s poke %actor.name% say Hmm... not bad stock for my experiments.  I may save your corpse. emote grins diabolically. cackle endif if (%actor.class% /= Cleric || %actor.class% /= Priest) && %clericquest% < 2 wait 5 ponder wait 2 s mechoaround %actor% Luchiaans leans close to %actor.name%. whisper %actor.name% Can you teach me some of your healing spells? whisper %actor.name% I may have a need for the theory of regeneration. endif endif

triggers.name: only_clerics_enter
triggers.commands: if %actor.level% < 100 if (%actor.class% /= Cleric || %actor.class% /= Priest) wsend %actor% You feel a calmness come over you, as if the troubles of the world are washed away. if %entry% == "" set entry 1 global entry else eval entry %entry% + 1 endif else wsend %actor% You can't seem to enter the room!  It is like stepping against a solid wall, wsend %actor% &0but you can see in. wsend %actor% You seem to hear a voice whisper, 'This room is not for you.' return 0 endif endif

triggers.name: want_to_help_Luchiaans
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 if (%actor.class% /= Cleric || %actor.class% /= Priest) set class C endif if (%actor.class% /= Necromancer || %actor.class% /= Sorcerer) set class S endif if %speech% /= teach? if %class% != C laugh %actor.name% say I have nothing to learn from you, %actor.name% you upstart! elseif %clericquest% == 3 say Thanks, but I don't need any more cleric books. else say Yes, well, not exactly teach, there is a book of cleric spells in the town, but only a cleric can get it. chuckle say If you bring it to me I will reward you. if %clericquest% != 2 set clericquest 1 global clericquest endif endif else if %class% != S pat %actor.name% say No way would I want to be partners with anyone but a sorceror. elseif %actor.level% < 30 say Sorry, %actor.name%.  I think you are a bit puny to be my partner at the moment. elseif %magequest% == 2 say Sorry, I've already got everything I need in order to start building up my zombie army. else smile say Great, %actor.name%. say Let's get this relationship off to a flying start - bring me a phoenix heart. say I need it for my regeneration potions. emote rubs his hands together in glee. say I think Rana Theroxa has a pet phoenix somewhere near the council chambers. set magequest 1 global magequest endif endif endif

triggers.name: non_clerics_out
triggers.commands: if %self.people% set rnd %random.char% if (%rnd.room% == %self.vnum%) && (%rnd.vnum% == -1) && (%rnd.level% < 100) && !(%rnd.class% /= Cleric || %rnd.class% /= Priest) wsend %rnd% You feel a force pushing you out of the room - you are powerless to resist! wechoaround %rnd% %rnd.name% suddenly starts moving out of the room. wteleport %rnd% 51050 wsend %rnd% You seem to hear a voice whisper, 'This room is not for you.' wait 8 wforce %rnd% look endif endif

triggers.name: open_display_case
triggers.commands: if %got_book% == 1 wsend %actor% You marvel at the resonant tones of your voice, perhaps you should be an actor. else wecho The display case folds and collapses to the floor. wpurge display-case wload obj 51022 * load the display case in the holding area to avoid a second oneloading wat 51099 wload obj 51021 set got_book 1 global got_book endif

triggers.name: complete_the_book
triggers.commands: *we wont hold the magic... return 0 * actor must be holding the magic book if %actor.wearing[51022]% osend %actor% You feel a strong attraction between the book and the magic - you can't hold them apart! oechoaround %actor% %actor.name% appears to be struggling to keep the book and the magic apart, but vainly. wait 1 s oecho The magic melts into the book, and makes it whole! wait 6 oecho The book glows more and more brightly! osend %actor% Ack - the book is heating up too! You don't think you can hold it much longer... oforce %actor% remove book-of-healing opurge book-of-healing osend %actor% You drop the book hurriedly to avoid burning yourself! oechoaround %actor% %actor.name% drops a large book. oload obj 51023 opurge %self% else osend %actor% You can't seem to get a proper grip on it, it almost squirms. endif

triggers.name: guardian_of_book
triggers.commands: if %actor.room% >= 51000 && %actor.room% <= 51099 && %alreadyrun% != 1 oload mob 51025 oforce guardian say You are not worthy to handle the book of Nordus! set alreadyrun 1 global alreadyrun oforce guardian hit %actor.name% endif

triggers.name: guardian_of_book_reset
triggers.commands: unset alreadyrun * remove global variable so next get loads guardian >:-)

triggers.name: give_to_luchiaans
triggers.commands: switch %object.vnum% * damaged book...there is another part to do yet case 51022 wait 5 say Hmm...a damaged spellbook. wait 2 s say Look, %actor.name%, why don't you fix this and then maybe we can talk. return 0 set clericquest 2 global clericquest break * complete spellbook - did we do this in one go (bonus) case 51023 wait 5 grin say %actor.name%, you've done me proud. say Although I guess you haven't really done any favours for the rest of the world! cackle mpurge book-of-healing if %clericquest% == 1 say And you did it all on your own initiative!  Well, here's a gift you can use. mload obj 51024 give wand %actor.name% elseif %clericquest% == 2 say Even though I had to help you, you did succeed, so here is a small reward. mload obj 51025 give wand %actor.name% else say Best of all, I didn't even ask you to do this, so I don't owe you anything. cackle endif set clericquest 3 global clericquest break case 51028 wait 5 say Thanks, %actor.name%. say Now I can generate an army of undead, unkillable zombies to help in my plans. cackle mpurge phoenix-heart if %magequest% == 1 say Oh... about that partner thing.  You know I was joking right? emote looks a bit sheepish. say Well... here's a token of my thanks, but that's all you're getting. mload obj 51029 give green %actor.name% set magequest 2 global magequest else say It was very generous of you to give this when I didn't ask for it! grin endif break case 8550 halt break default return 0 mechoaround %actor% %actor.name% gives %object.shortdesc% to %self.name%. msend %actor% You give %object.shortdesc% to %self.name%. wait 8 say What am I supposed to do with this? msend %actor% %self.name% returns %object.shortdesc% to you. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% returns %object.shortdesc% to %actor.name%. done

triggers.name: kill_rana
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == 51010 wait 1 wecho An large image of a face appears in the room. wforce rana say I'll kill you Luchiaans, but slowly wecho %actor.name% waves the petrified magic defiantly. wforce rana say This will protect me against you. wait 5 wecho The aparition laughs and says a couple of words. wdamage %actor% 10000 wecho The aparition chuckles and says, 'Well, HE underestimated my power bigtime.' wait 5 wecho The aparition fades. endif

triggers.name: phoenix_croaked
triggers.commands: return 0 mecho The phoenix closes its eyes and bursts into flame! mload obj 51028 mexp %actor% -28000

triggers.name: get_heart_of_phoenix
triggers.commands: * this is only an issue if the heart has not already been got... if %already_got% != 1 * need to be wearing (on hands) object 51026 to get heart if %actor.wearing[51026]% osend %actor% The corpse is extremely hot and may combust soon! oexp %actor% 30000 return 1 set already_got 1 global already_got else osend %actor% The corpse is too hot to touch without special protection! return 0 endif wait 2 s oecho The corpse suddenly crumbles to ash. endif

triggers.name: phoenix_lives_again
triggers.commands: * We purge phoenix a lot here. This is to ensure that the phoenix's * corpse goes away. Don't want to "purge corpse" because there might * be a player corpse. Purge multiple times on the random off * chance that there might be a phoenix key or something on the ground. wat 51079 wpurge phoenix wat 51079 wpurge phoenix wat 51079 wpurge phoenix wat 51079 wpurge phoenix wat 51079 wpurge phoenix wat 51079 wecho The heat of the combustion scorches everything! wait 2s wat 51079 wecho The phoenix rises again from the ashes! wat 51079 wload mob 51026 wat 51079 wforce phoenix whistle

triggers.name: rana_receive1
triggers.commands: emote examines her new prize briefly. say So...this is it eh?  The legendary protection spell! remove page drop page hold magic follow %actor.name% say Take me to Luchiaans now - I am ready to terminate his sorry existence!

triggers.name: rana_speak1
triggers.commands: say Yes... ponder say I wonder where he is now, or even if he survived? The only reason I am still here is as a punishment. growl wait 1 say But if I ever catch that Luchiaans, I'll make him regret this. think say Of course, as soon as I got within striking distance he'd fry me with his magic. sigh wait 1 say I will have to just plan my revenge for now. daydream

triggers.name: rana_speak2
triggers.commands: look %actor.name% nod wait 1 say Yes, Shema.  She used to be the cleric on the council until that upstart sorcerer came along. sigh say He fooled us all, and then a cleaner came across a book in his office that suddenly shed light on a lot of things. shake wait 1 say All that stuff about the insane and how he might be able to help them. whap me say But now he has gone to ground and we are left to pick up the pieces of our once proud town. cry %actor.name%

triggers.name: rana_rand1
triggers.commands: sigh say I should have known it was all too good to be true.  I should have listened to Shema. whap me

triggers.name: new trigger
triggers.commands: wecho trigger running wait until 00:00 wecho trigger over

triggers.name: crazed_survivor_speak1
triggers.commands: say Yes, I used to be a cleaner in the Council chambers and one day I found a book in the corner of Luchiaans' office. emote scratches his chin. say I told the Council leader about it, and three days later the town is like it is now. say Nothing has happened since, but I can feel something brewing. wait 1 shrug say I presume the book is still there, leastways I didn't touch it, not after what I'd read from it. emote rubs his arms as if he is suddenly cold.

triggers.name: crazed_survivor_speak2
triggers.commands: peer %actor.name% say Hmm..yes..it's been in my family for years and we were taught as children that if we held it, we would be protected from some spells. say Although, this is the only spell that has been affected by it.  All my neighbors became zombies in one night and I was the only one to remain sane. shiver say I wish I'd never found that stupid book now. sigh

triggers.name: crazed_survivor_greet1
triggers.commands: panic say You have come for my magic haven't you? say Well you can't have it, you can't!  I need it!

triggers.name: Unused trigger
triggers.commands: ponder %actor.name% say You are attentive, very impressive. mteleport %actor.name% 51071

triggers.name: luchiaans_death
triggers.commands: mecho Before his death, Luchiaans silently chants his final incantation. mecho You briefly see a flash of light, and you hear a loud BOOOM! mteleport all 51000 mat 51000 mforce all look

triggers.name: common_child_speak1
triggers.commands: mecho Both the child's heads focus their attention on you. mecho One head says, 'That is the key to decoding Luchiaans' spells.' mecho The other head says, 'Avenge us, adventurer!' beg %actor.name%

triggers.name: common_child_rand1
triggers.commands: mecho One head looks at the other and says, 'So how do you know the phrase is kafit, and I don't?' mecho The second head smirks disturbingly, its eyes flat and lifeless. mecho The second head responds, 'Because I was awake before you when he had to decode his final spell.'

rooms.name: The Gate of Nordus
rooms.description: You are standing at the gate of Nordus.  The walls are a mere 5 feet tall, yet no matter how hard you try you cannot pass over the walls.  There is some kind of magic preventing you from going over.  To the north you see a gate that seems to lead to the village.  A strange tingling sensation encircles your body as you get closer to the gate and the village.

North.description: You see a small metal gate to the north.

South.description: There is a path to the south.

rooms.name: A Path to the Courtyard
rooms.description: You are now on a short path that leads to the main Courtyard of Nordus. It's not very worn down, and large pebbles and stones make your feet ache as you continue towards the Courtyard.

North.description: To the north is the Courtyard of Nordus.

South.description: This path leads to the gate of Nordus to the south.

rooms.name: The Main Courtyard of Nordus
rooms.description: This is the main Courtyard of Nordus.  There are exits in all directions, that lead to different sections of the village.  To the north is the center of this Courtyard.

North.description: To the north is the center of the main Courtyard.

East.description: You can see the SE corner of the Courtyard.

South.description: A path leading to the gate is to the south.

West.description: You can see the SW corner of the Courtyard to the west.

rooms.name: The Center of the Courtyard
rooms.description: This is the main Courtyard of Nordus.  There are exits all around, leading to different sections of this large village.  There is a sign here.

North.description: To the north you can see a small building in the distance.

East.description: You can see a small path leading off to the east.

South.description: You see the Courtyard to the south.

West.description: You can see the Courtyard to the west.

extras.text: Welcome to the Village of Nordus, traveler! You can find many things inside our humble village, here is a handy guide. To the north can be found the High Council's Chambers. Travel west to sample some of our many shops and our fine Inn. To the east you can find the common grounds, where people meet to have fun. To exit our fine village, go south through the gate. Enjoy your stay at Nordus.

rooms.name: The Courtyard of Nordus
rooms.description: Where you stand now is really worn down, no rocks or pebbles can be seen. There seems to have been a lot of activity in this area; now however, there is none.  To the north a ways away you can see a small building.

North.description: To the north is a path leading to a building.

East.description: You can see the NE corner of the Courtyard.

South.description: To the south is the center of the Courtyard.

West.description: You can see the NW corner of the Courtyard.

rooms.name: A Small Worn Down Path
rooms.description: This a small worn down path, that leads to a building to the north.  There seems to have been some recent activity, as you can see footprints and other tracks suggesting recent usage.  The building to the north looms closer into view.

North.description: The path continues to the north.

South.description: To the south, the Courtyard can be seen.

rooms.name: A Small Worn Down Path
rooms.description: This path continues to the north where the building can be seen clearly now. Various shrubs and bushes litter the path on both sides.  However you notice that the shrubs and bushes seem to be glowing.  You try to pick one, but you get a quick ZAP!  , and retract quickly.  What kind of magic is this?

North.description: You can see a building directly ahead to the north.

South.description: You can see a small path leading south.

rooms.name: The Entrance to the High Council's Chambers
rooms.description: You are standing at the entrance of the building where the High Council meets and discusses various matters about the village.  Many people must come here as all around is well traveled, and the landscaping is beautiful.  Trees, bushes, shrubs and wildflowers litter the surroundings, making the air smell sweet and inviting, and the view relaxes the eye.

North.description: A large door blocks your entrance to the north.

South.description: To the south a small path can be seen.

rooms.name: The Council Greeting Room
rooms.description: You have entered the building, and what a sight it is.  Although made out of common materials, it is remarkably beautiful.  This is where the guests of the council are greeted and directed to the appropriate room, so as not to disturb others hard at work.  You hear squishy noises coming from the walls, and if you didn't know better you'd say the walls were alive, but that's impossible.  The walls can't be alive...  Can they?

North.description: You can see a large room the north, it looks to be a dining room.

East.description: You can see a coat closet to the east.

South.description: You see a large door, blocking your way out.

West.description: To the west you can see a waiting room.

extras.text: As you look at the walls, they seem to contract and expand, almost like a muscle.  If you didn't know better, you'd say these walls are living!

rooms.name: The Coat Closet
rooms.description: You are standing in a musty coat closet.  The guest's coats are taken and placed in here in a customary manner, to be stored until they leave.  There are still a couple of coats hanging up.  Maybe someone is still here.

West.description: You see the greeting room to the west.

rooms.name: The Waiting Room
rooms.description: You are standing in the waiting room, where guests are asked to wait until the council is ready to see them.  The chairs and couches are very comfortable and inviting.  There are pictures adorning the wall that depict beautiful lands and wondrous scenes of nature.  There are small tables with arrangements of flowers on them, making the room smell pleasant.  You also notice the fireplace in the center of the room that is burning softly and casting gentle heat into the room, making the atmosphere almost perfect.

East.description: You can see the greeting room to the east.

rooms.name: The Council's Dining Room
rooms.description: You are standing in the Council's dining room, where they entertain guests. This room is spacious and is decorated beautifully with flowers and stained glass, giving the room a glowing hue.  The table can easily seat 20 people, and by the looks of it the council is just about to eat.  The table is set and waiting for people.  Five baskets of bread, some kind of local bird is already served on all of the plates.  There are glasses full of red wine near each plate.  In the middle table there is a beautiful arrangement of flowers.

East.description: You can see a staircase to the east.

South.description: You can see the greeting room to the south.

West.description: You can see the kitchen to the west.

rooms.name: The Council Kitchen
rooms.description: You are standing in the kitchen of the Council.  You can see food on the counters.  There is a person here, presumably the chef, who is chopping up some food, to add to the virtual feast.  You notice that the floor is slippery and full of a slimy substance, what could it be?

East.description: You can see the dining room to the east.

extras.text: As you look at the floor it is covered by a slimy substance,  that is very cold to the touch, and smells like cinnamon.  What could it be?

rooms.name: A Staircase Leading to The Second Level
rooms.description: This foyer leads to a stair landing that rises upward to the second level of the building.  It's very small and meager looking.  The only thing in the whole room is a wooden staircase that looks very sturdy.

West.description: You can see the dining room to the west.

Up.description: You can see the second level from here.

rooms.name: The Top of the Staircase
rooms.description: You are standing at the top of the staircase.  There is a hall to your east, with doors on either side, that leads to some kind of meeting chamber. Directly to your north you can see a closed door.  You can feel a strange tingling sensation as you continue onward.

North.description: You can see a flimsy door to the north.

East.description: You can see a hall to the east.

Down.description: You can see the bottom of the stairwell.

rooms.name: A Small Hall
rooms.description: You are standing in a small hall that leads towards a meeting room of some kind.  Maybe the meeting room of the High Council.  There are doors to your north and south, or you can continue to the east.

North.description: There is a wooden door to the north.

East.description: You can see the hall continue to the east.

South.description: There is a small wooden door to the south.  There seems to be a nameplate on the door.

West.description: You can see the top of the staircase to the west.

extras.text: The nameplate is highly polished and reads: "Offices of Councillor Luchiaans".

rooms.name: A Small Office
rooms.description: You are standing in a small office.  It's cluttered in here and you can barely move around.  Either the person that occupied this office was very messy, or it got destroyed by someone or something.

South.description: There is a wooden door to the south.

rooms.name: A Small Office
rooms.description: This is a very tidy office, everything is neatly in its place.  The desk is cleared and the books on the bookshelf are well organized.  Obviously the owner of this office was not planning on doing much work in here though, as you can see no writing implements, and there is an air of abandonment about the room.

North.description: You can see a wooden door to the north.

extras.text: There are many books in the shelf.  There are books about all the classical subject matters.  There is quite an impressive collection here.
The bookshelf is carved with fine art work.  It is sturdy and looks as though it has been around for a while.  It must have taken a master craftsman to do this type of work!

rooms.name: A Small Hall
rooms.description: You are traveling down a small hallway.  To the east not far away you can see a meeting room that is fairly large.  To the north there is an open door. Your skin tingles more and more as you continue farther down the hall.

North.description: You can see an open door to the north.

East.description: You can see the end of the hall to the east.

West.description: You can see a small hall to the west.

rooms.name: A Small Closet of Supplies
rooms.description: You are in what could be termed a janitor's closet.  Cleaning supplies, mops, sponges and other miscellaneous items litter this room.  You notice that something in this room doesn't seem right.  The light in here is very dim and there is a yellowish tint to it.  You can also hear your breathing more than usual, something seems to be amplifying your senses.  What a strange place you are in!

South.description: You can see a small hall to the south.

rooms.name: The End of The Hall
rooms.description: You are standing at the end of the hall.  To the south is an ornate door, and to the east is the large meeting room that has been piquing your curiosity. There is a sweet smell coming from the south, and you can feel a strange sensation coming from the east.

East.description: You can see a large meeting room directly to the east.

South.description: You can see an ornate door with strange markings and symbols covering it.

West.description: You can see the hall continue to the west.

rooms.name: Rana Theroxa's Chamber
rooms.description: You are standing inside Rana Theroxa's chamber.  Being the elected official of the people, he is the highest ranking official in Nordus.  He holds the title of Lord.  This room is very ornate, and has trophies and statues decorating it.  Letters, complaints, petitions, and other miscellaneous papers cover the desk in the center of the room.

North.description: You see an ornate door to the north.

extras.text: You look at the clutter on the desk and you can't really make out any important information.  The papers are technical in nature and look to be some kind of draft for a law, it's very unclear as to what was actually trying to be written.
The trophies on the wall are from miscellaneous places, some are hunting trophies and plaques, some are from public service and for Rana Theroxa's dedication to his village.

rooms.name: The Council's Meeting Room
rooms.description: You are standing in the room where the council meets, it is very modest. There is a large table in the middle of the room, with 10 chairs surrounding it.  Papers clutter part of the table as if someone has been working hard on something.  There is a large picture on the wall that depicts a flowing river with people fishing on the banks.  The chairs are not very lavish but they look comfortable.  All the chairs are empty, but you get the feeling that there is someone or something in here with you.  You feel a chill go down your spine as you sense movement behind you.

West.description: You can see a hall to the west.

rooms.name: Darkness......
rooms.description: As you enter this room, all light seems to be absorbed.  You can't see a thing.  You feel dizzy and your senses are distorted.  You can only hear a low growling noise that comes from all around you.

rooms.name: The Courtyard of Nordus
rooms.description: You are standing in the Courtyard of Nordus.  You can go west and make your way to the inn and shops, or you could go back to the Courtyard to the east and south.

North.description: You can see the NW corner of the Courtyard to the north.

East.description: The center of the Courtyard is to the east.

South.description: You can see the Courtyard of Nordus to the south.

West.description: You can see a road going to the west.

rooms.name: The SW Courtyard of Nordus
rooms.description: You are in the SW corner of the Courtyard.  You can go east or north from here.  This Courtyard is very barren, however you notice that there are some strange colored flowers growing here.

North.description: You can see the Courtyard to the north.

East.description: You can see the Courtyard to the east.

extras.text: You have never seen this type of flower before, the centre of each flower looks almost like a human face...  Wait, it IS a human face, and it's screaming...

rooms.name: Merchants Row
rooms.description: You are standing on a road that leads towards the shop building and the inn. You can travel east and go back to the Courtyard or west to make your way to the shops and the Flirting Puppy Inn.

East.description: You can see the Courtyard to the east.

South.description: You can see a small shack to the south.

West.description: Merchant Row continues to the west, where you can see the Shops building.

rooms.name: Merchants Row
rooms.description: You are standing on Merchants Row.  To your north you can see the shop building.  To the west you can see the inn.  You can go back to the east to get back to the Courtyard.

North.description: You can see the Shops Building to the north.

East.description: You can see Merchants Row continue to the east.

West.description: You can see the INN to the east.

rooms.name: The Entrance to Shop Center
rooms.description: You are at the entrance to the shops.  There is a hall to your north. Shops litter the hall ahead, although it appears that none of the shops are open at this time.  There is a bad smell coming from somewhere around here. You can also see flowers that are glowing unnaturally all over the walls and ceilings.

North.description: You can see a hallway to the north.

South.description: You can see Merchants Row to the south.

rooms.name: A Hallway Full of Shops
rooms.description: You are walking down a hallway full of shops.  To the west and east you can see the two major shops in this section, a Pawn Shop and an Armor Shop. Neither shop looks open; however, there are people inside them.

North.description: The hallway continues to the north and there are more shops.

East.description: You can see the Armor Shop to the east.

South.description: You can see the entrance to this building to the south.

West.description: You can see the Pawn Shop to the west.

rooms.name: Nordus Pawn and Novelty
rooms.description: This pawn shop is illuminated by a strange light that has no apparent source.  It's particularly warm in this shop.  The dirt here is fine, not coarse like in most of the village.  You can see what appears to be some kind of creature just sitting on the counter here.  You wonder what has happened to this whole village.  A boarded-up door to the north has a note on it.

North.description: PLTWK ZHWIL OIXMB XGFVZ LIYBX

East.description: You can see the hallway to the east.

extras.text: When you look at the coin that is attached to the chain, you notice that the chain is also connected to something, removing more dirt you can see that there is some kind of an opening, perhaps a grate or grating of somekind. But what is it's purpose?  Where does it lead?  You notice there is a keyhole in the grating.
You look at the indent in the floor and move some dirt around and you notice that there is a coin attached to a chain under the dirt.
As you look at the ground you can make out a single set of footprints that are everywhere, perhaps the shopkeeper's footprints.  You notice one spot in the dirt that looks indented a bit.

rooms.name: The Nordus Armory
rooms.description: You are standing in the Nordus Armory.  There are many pieces of fine armor, solidly attached to the wall.  You notice that this room seems rather cold compared to other rooms.  You also notice that this room has a rather pleasant odor seemingly originating from nowhere.  There is a sign posted on the wall.

West.description: You can see the hallway to the east.

extras.text: The sign reads: To all who enter here, LEAVE! I am one of the remaining "normal" people that are left.  Our town has been attacked by a magical force the likes that we have never seen.  People have been slowly changing into strange, exotic and horrific creatures.  Some have just disappeared. Some people in town, while not physically changed, have lost their ability to think rationally, and have become crazy.  There are only a handful of us left and we are all suspicious of each other. Rana Theroxa and the High Council, the Elders, myself and the Pawn shop owner and some of the villagers are all that is left!  I fear I am going soon also. Be forewarned, LEAVE WHILE YOU CAN!

rooms.name: A Hallway Full of Shops
rooms.description: As you walk down the hallway, you can't help but notice some peculiar things.  Some areas are warmer than others, some are much colder.  There is abundant vegetation and wildlife in some places, while others are barren.  You wonder what is causing these various changes.

North.description: You can see a stairwell, leading to the second level of this building.

East.description: You can see the village of Nordus Magic Shop to the east.

South.description: The hallway continues to the south.

West.description: You see a Weapon Shop to the west.

rooms.name: The Nordus Weaponry
rooms.description: As you enter you notice but one thing.  The shop is barren.  No vegetation, wildlife, or any unusual temperatures.  The shop seems to be devoid of energy; there is nothing, Just a table adorns this otherwise abandoned shop.  You do notice out of the corner of your eye something move.  You look again but don't see anything; Maybe it was your imagination.

East.description: You see a hallway to the east.

rooms.name: The Apothecary of Nordus
rooms.description: When you enter you notice that time seems to go slower, but if you move it speeds up.  Almost like quicksand, but quick-time.  The more you move the faster time seems to go.  What is going on here?  You notice that the shop keeper is here, maybe he is the cause for these mutations and strange occurrences.

West.description: To the west you can see a hallway.

rooms.name: A Stairwell Leading to The Second Level
rooms.description: This place is very very dark.  You can barely see.  The exception to this is the stairwell, which is glowing softly.  You think you can make it to the second level by the outline of the stairs.

South.description: You can see a hallway to the south.

Up.description: You can see the top of the stairwell straight up.

rooms.name: The Top of The Stairwell
rooms.description: You are at the top of the stairwell, and you can see all down the hallway. It's fairly dark, but your light-source is bright enough to help you see.  At the end of the hallway you can see a bright light.

South.description: To the south the hallway continues.

Down.description: You can see the bottom of the glowing stairwell.

rooms.name: The Second Level of Shop Center
rooms.description: As you walk down this hallway you can see that there don't seem to be any shops that even look to be open.  They are all shut up airtight.  Why is the second level so sealed, and the first so open?  There is a sign hastily mounted on a supporting beam here.

North.description: To the north you can see a stairwell.

South.description: You can see down the hallway to the south.

extras.text: There are no open shops on this level. This building was under construction when IT started to happen. We have halted construction until it is safe to continue.

rooms.name: The Second Level of Shop Center
rooms.description: This part of the hallway is especially dark.  However you feel that strange tingling sensation and it's very intense here.  You can't concentrate as your body is overwhelmed by the strength of the sensation.  It's flooding all parts of your body, almost consuming you.

North.description: You can see the hall continue to the north.

South.description: You can see the end of the hallway to the south.

rooms.name: The End of The Hallway
rooms.description: As you continue your journey you see what has illuminated the end of this hallway.  The entire floor where you stand is glowing brightly and there is no apparent source.  The light is warm and comforting.  You don't want to leave, as you feel very comfortable and safe.  You notice a peculiar odor coming from somewhere.

North.description: The hallway continues to the north.

East.description: You can smell a foul odor coming from the east.

rooms.name: Bloody's Den
rooms.description: This room smells HORRID.  You can't even begin to comprehend what is causing the odor.  You look quickly around the room and find the source of this revolting stench.  Looking more closely you can see streaks of blood and little pieces of flesh that are turning putrid.  The stench is overwhelming and you can't take it for much longer.

West.description: You can see a hallway to the west.

rooms.name: The Entrance to The Flirting Puppy Inn
rooms.description: You are now standing at the entrance to the Flirting Puppy Inn.  You can just imagine this place where there are people bustling around, but not a soul can be seen.  To the west you can see the Gambling casino, to the north the Inn can be found, to the south you can see a Pub, and to exit this fine establishment, you can leave through the east.  The lack of people in the Flirting Puppy sends a chill down your spine.  Where is everyone?

North.description: You can see the INN of the Flirting Puppy to the north.

East.description: You can see Merchants Row to the east.

South.description: You can see the Pub to the south.

West.description: You can see the Casino to the east.

rooms.name: The Inn of the Flirting Puppy
rooms.description: You are now in a small room, there is not much decor around you.  You can see a receptionists desk, but no receptionist.  There is a blue-green moss covering the walls here, and you notice a pungent odor coming from upstairs.

South.description: You can see the entrance to this building to the south.

Up.description: You can see the second level of the Flirting Puppy.

rooms.name: The Upper Level of The Flirting Puppy
rooms.description: This large room is very barren.  Its large size does not make up for the fact that there is nothing in here.  You can smell a horrible odor coming from somewhere in this room.  A golden light surrounds you as you walk through the room, almost as if you are surrounded by a forcefield.

Down.description: You can see the Inn of the Flirting Puppy downward.

rooms.name: The Casino of The Flirting Puppy
rooms.description: You are standing inside the Casino of The Flirting Puppy.  You can see many card and dice tables around you.  You can imagine what it could have been like with people here, but it's empty and you're the only soul in sight.  You can imagine yourself having a great time in here; if only you knew what happened to everyone.

East.description: You can see the Entrance to the east.

rooms.name: The Pub of The Flirting Puppy
rooms.description: You are standing in a dimly lit room.  The smell of alcohol permeates the air.  There are tables set up all around the room, and a long bar in front of the room.  You can just imagine ordering a nice Firebreather and gulping it down with some friends as you chat and soak up the relaxing atmosphere.  You get depressed at the fact that there is no one here to enjoy all of this with you.

North.description: You can see the Entrance to the north.

rooms.name: The SE Corner of the Courtyard
rooms.description: You are in the SE corner of the Courtyard of Nordus.  There isn't much in the way of decoration, in fact it's rather plain.  You can see a small distortion to your south.  The air here tingles and makes your hair dance on edge.  What is going on here?

North.description: You can see the Courtyard to the North.

West.description: You can see the Courtyard to the west.

extras.text: You can see what seems like a shimmering of time and space.  When you try and touch the disturbance, your hand get a quick shock, the distortion wavers slightly and then it starts to hum.  When you back away from it, it returns to it's original state.  Strange things are amist here.

rooms.name: In the Courtyard of Nordus
rooms.description: You are standing in the easterly section of the Courtyard.  There is much wear and tear on the earth in this particular place, and it gets even more worn down if you continue to the east.  You can see a small building and a rather large area far to the east; it looks like a common ground for the village, a place to meet and relax.

North.description: You can see the NE section of the Courtyard to the north.

East.description: You can see a rather large worn down path leading to the east.

South.description: You can see the SE section of the Courtyard.

West.description: You can see the Courtyard to the west.

rooms.name: A Small Shack
rooms.description: You stand inside a small shack.  Many things litter the ground, but are of no value to you in your journey.  There is a picture on the wall, and a small desk in the corner.

North.description: You can see Merchants Row to the north.

extras.text: You can see an unfinished painting on the wall.  It depicts horrible changes of the town.  People are running scared from someone or something, there is a soft glowing aura to the painting as if it is magical in nature.  You touch the painting and find out it's very soft and lush, but yet, durable and sturdy at the same time.
You can see a small piece of paper laying on the desk.

You look at the paper, and see that it is a letter: To whomever finds this, Ever since that travelling sorcerer arrived here with his strange trinkets for sale, things have been going wrong in this town. He must have got some hold over the council to get elected, and after that people started to go crazy and attack each other for no reason. Then they started to disappear into 'rehabilitation' but never returned. There are now only a few of us left and even I am not safe any more, only last night some mindless creatures tried to attack me in my own house and when I tried to use magic against them, I found it hard to remember the right words. I write this in the hope that someone will avenge this town. May the Goddess of Mielikki have mercy on us -Shema

rooms.name: The NE corner of the Courtyard
rooms.description: This part of the Courtyard is not very well worn down.  It's not well lit either.  Shadows creep in from every direction.  A cold chill runs down your back and you feel as though you are being watched, but by who or what?

South.description: You can see the Courtyard to the South.

West.description: You can see the Courtyard to the west.

rooms.name: The NW corner of the Courtyard
rooms.description: This corner of the Courtyard is very shoddy.  There are miscellaneous items of trash lying around.  You can see ripped clothing of all sorts covering the area here.  You also notice pools of blood on the ground, and the smell of death permeates the air.

North.description: A plain door in the north wall almost escapes your notice.

East.description: You can see the Courtyard to the east.

South.description: You can see the Courtyard to the south.

extras.text: You can see ripped clothing, soaked in blood, lying on the ground here. The stains are still damp, indicating that the injury that caused the bleeding occurred recently.
Small broken cups plates and miscellaneous items litter the floor here.  It's like someone dropped some personal items and just left them here.

rooms.name: A Large Worn Down Path
rooms.description: You stand on a large path leading to the east.  You can go east to get to the gathering grounds or to the west back to the Courtyard.  This path is very desolate.  No vegetation nor wildlife of any kind can be seen.  The air here seems very clean and fresh, almost pure.

East.description: This path continues on to the east.

West.description: You can see the Courtyard to the west.

rooms.name: A Large Lush Path
rooms.description: You are now standing in a lush field of vegetation, with a path leading right through it to the gathering ground.  It's amazing, the change in scenery, it can't be natural at all.  You look closer at the plants and can actually see them growing!  What wonderful and strange magic is at work?

North.description: You can see a small turn in the path to the north.

West.description: You can see a large path to the west.

rooms.name: A Small Turn in the Path
rooms.description: This is where the path turns slightly, you can see the gathering ground directly to the east.  There air here seems to be very humid and warm.  You notice also that the air seems to have a reddish hue to it.  The path continues southward.

East.description: You can see the Gathering Grounds directly to the east.

South.description: You can see a path to the south.

rooms.name: The Gathering Ground
rooms.description: You are standing directly in the middle of the gathering ground.  There are many logs setup in a circular fashion around a large fire pit, where a great feast could be cooked, and where people could go for warmth through the night. The fire is still red hot, indicating that someone has been here recently. There is a small building to the south.

South.description: You can see a small building to the south.

West.description: You can see a small turn in the path to the west.

rooms.name: The Entrance to a Solid Building
rooms.description: You are standing before a very sturdy looking building.  The one door in the front of the building is locked and you can't see any other way in.  There are some markings on the door, as if someone or something tried to make its way inside.  You wonder what could possibly be inside.

North.description: You can see the Gathering Grounds to the north.

South.description: There is a solid door blocking your way to the south.

rooms.name: Inside of the Solid Building
rooms.description: You are standing inside of the building.  There is a table in the middle of the room, some pictures hang on the wall and some food is left uneaten on the counter behind you.  You can hear noise coming from the east.

North.description: You can see a solid door to the north.

East.description: You can see a small room to the east.

rooms.name: An Old Musty-Smelling Room
rooms.description: This room smells very musty, dust covers every inch of the floor.  You try and hold back your sneezes.  The floor beneath you shows signs of recent activity and you think you can see someone moving in the shadows.  Whoever it is, he or she makes no noise as if trying to hide.  But from who or what?

West.description: You can see a small room to the west.

extras.text: You look at the floor and it's very scuffed up with footprints.  Recent activity is very appearent and.  The dust in the area is very thick, except for on the floor, it's very strange.

rooms.name: A Warm Study
rooms.description: This is Luchiaan's study.  There is a bookcase on one wall, full of books arranged in alphabetical order.  There is a chair to one side of the room.  A fireplace in the center of the room heats the surrounding area.  There is a desk in the far corner with a comfortable looking chair.  You notice there is clutter on the desk.

West.description: You can see a small hallway to the west.

extras.text: You can see a clutter of papers and writing tools lying all over the desk. Someone has been writing a lot down on paper.  You can't make much of it out, as the writing is not too legible, however you can see something about spells and perfecting a new technique.  The rest is garbled and unreadable.

rooms.name: A Small Well Lit Hallway
rooms.description: You are walking down a hall made entirely of stone.  There are many torches attached to the wall that light this hall completely.  You can see some moss growing on the floor and walls.  The moss is slimy to the touch and smells sweet.  You notice a pair of rats scurry past your feet, both are carrying a piece of the moss in their mouths.  The hallway continues down to the west, and a bubbling noise can be heard from the north.

North.description: You can see a dimly lit hallway to the north.

East.description: You can see a small study to the east.

West.description: You can continue down the hallway to the west.

rooms.name: An Echoing Hallway
rooms.description: All through this hall bubbling and boiling noises can be heard coming from the north.  There is a sour smell permeating the air as well.  You can barely think to yourself as the noise and smells are penetrating to your senses.  You start to become lightheaded, continuing your trip would be wise.  The walls are cracked and chipped to the east, smooth to the west, rough upwards and very cold below your feet.

North.description: You can see a small lab to the north.

South.description: You can see a well lit hallway.

extras.text: The floor is incredibly cold to the touch, in fact the cold penetrates your footware and makes your feet chilly.
The walls are so smooth they resemble a highly polished metal or glass. It is a very eerie feeling.
The ceiling above you is incredibly rough, almost as if it were sandpaper.

As you look at the wall you notice that there are many stones falling out of this section of the wall.  As you touch the wall it crumbles a bit, causing debris to fall on the floow.  You also notice that where the debris fell from the wall, there is a faint outline of some sort of secret door.

rooms.name: A Well Lit Hallway
rooms.description: As you walk down this well lit hallway, you can hear a clinking sound, like that of metal clashing against metal from the south.  This hall also continues to the west, where you can smell the pleasant odor of a well cooked meal.  You notice that there seems to be electricity in the air; it makes your hair stand on end and your skin tingle.

East.description: You can see a well lit hall to the east.

South.description: You can see an arched hallway to the south.

West.description: You can continue down this hallway to the west.

rooms.name: A Small Laboratory
rooms.description: You are standing in a small laboratory with many beakers and test tubes. There is a very sour smell that emanates from one of the experiments.  The smallness of this room indicates that this is just a preparatory lab, and that basic solutions and compounds are made here for use elsewhere.

South.description: You can see a small hall with terrible acoustics to the south.

rooms.name: An Arched Hallway
rooms.description: You are now inside of an arched hallway.  The construction of this hallway looks different than the other rooms.  The walls and ceiling are made out of a different material, smooth to the touch.  It feels smooth and it's shiny like steel, yet it's positively stone.  You can see a door to the west, where the clanking noise is originating from.

North.description: You can see a well lit hallway to the north.

West.description: You can see a very sturdy and solid redwood door.

rooms.name: The Experiment Chamber
rooms.description: The smell of rotting flesh and death penetrates the air and fills your nostrils, you do all you can to hold back your vomiting reflex.  There is a pile of organs from many different animals laying in a corner, and in the opposite corner there is a pile of bones with some flesh still clinging to them.  You bring your attention to the center of the room, where you can see many small and some large animals laying in the middle of the room, with many wounds of various natures.  Some are lifeless piles of flesh, with a beating heart keeping them just barely alive.  Others are small woodland creatures with grievous wounds that will kill them slowly.  You find the source of the clanking that you heard in the hall.  Amidst all of the horrific scenes, there is a part man, part rat creature shackled to the wall.  He is slamming his wrists against the floor in an attempt to get himself free,but his efforts are fruitless.  You wish you could help each and every one of them, but you know that nothing but death can save these poor souls now.

East.description: You can see a solid redwood door.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Well Lit Hallway
rooms.description: You are standing at a turn in the well lit tunnel.  There are torches lining each side of the wall.  This tunnel continues to the north, where you can see a VERY large door at the end of the hall.  There is also a small door to your west.

North.description: The well lit hallway continues to the north.

East.description: You can continue down this hall to the east.

West.description: You can see a large metal door to the west.

rooms.name: A Small Supply Closet
rooms.description: You are standing in a small supply closet.  There are miscellaneous chemicals on some shelves.  There is a large bucket of a strange substance that you have never seen before, it is emitting a humming sound.  You try to open the bucket but it's sealed by a magical force.  You try to pick the bucket up, however it seems to weigh a ton.

East.description: You can see a metal door to the east.

rooms.name: A Well Lit Hallway, Leading to a Large Door
rooms.description: Continuing down the hallway you notice how extremely bright this passage is. There is a large door at the end of this hallway slightly to the north.  The torches are burning unnaturally bright, and they throw off a lot of heat.

North.description: You can see the last leg of this hallway to the north.

South.description: The hall continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Opal Door
