rooms.description: You are in an ante-chamber of sorts.  This part of the hallway is circular, and is much larger than the rest of the hallway.  A large Opal Door blocks your way to the north, where you can sense a large force of some kind.  It's very bright in here, and you can see every detail of the room, almost like your vision is improved in here.

North.description: A large Opal Door blocks your way.

South.description: The hallway continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Great Laboratory of Luchiaans
rooms.description: This room is absolutely HUGE!  There is equipment everywhere, compounds, liquids, books and scrolls everywhere you look.  The floor is spotless and you can almost see your reflection.  There is one large table with many experiments going on at once, with several smaller tables off to the right and left. Bubbling beakers, test tubes filled with a rainbow of colors line a whole wall of this room.  There must be thousands of potions there.  There is a very large desk with large tomes covering every inch of it.  Papers and scrolls cover every square inch of the desks.  The air is electric with magical energy.

South.description: You can see a large Opal Door to the south.

extras.text: There is some text on one of the parchments, but it looks like code: LOIBA KZGAD WASFH WAVQA KBVQR GVQUS AUGMR MZLF
They are covered with strange articles and parchments.
It is in a jargon not familiar to you.

rooms.name: A Small Hidden Room
rooms.description: You are now in a small hidden room.  You can't make out much of anything. In the middle of the room you can see a small chest.  There is also a carving in the wall that you can barely read.

West.description: You can see a small secret door to the west.

extras.text: The carving isn't very readable, this is what you can make out: " Y u ha   found t e tre  ur  r  m.  Gr  t rew  ds c n be fou d. us  you  im g n tion.  Te  p r ." That is all you can make out and it's not much.  What could it mean?

rooms.name: A Secret Room!
rooms.description: You have stumbled upon a secret room.  This room looks as though it's in some kind of a void.  There are no definitive walls or edges.  It's almost as though you are standing in space.  You notice a small chest in the center of the room.  The chest is highly decorated and very ornate.  The chest looks like it has something important in it.

Up.description: There seems to be some sort of indent in the ceiling.

rooms.name: A room in the maze
rooms.description: This place seems a bit confusing! Obviously Luchiaans didn't intend for many people to be coming through here. The apparent exits waver slightly as if they are only temporary.

Up.description: The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it.

rooms.name: A room in the maze
rooms.description: This place seems a bit confusing! Obviously Luchiaans didn't intend for many people to be coming through here. The apparent exits waver slightly as if they are only temporary.

South.description: The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it.

Up.description: This doorway looks more solid than the others.

rooms.name: A room in the maze
rooms.description: This place seems a bit confusing! Obviously Luchiaans didn't intend for many people to be coming through here. The apparent exits waver slightly as if they are only temporary.

North.description: The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it.

Down.description: The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it.

rooms.name: A room in the maze
rooms.description: This place seems a bit confusing! Obviously Luchiaans didn't intend for many people to be coming through here. The apparent exits waver slightly as if they are only temporary.

South.description: The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it.

West.description: The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it.

Down.description: The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it.

rooms.name: A room in the maze
rooms.description: This place seems a bit confusing! Obviously Luchiaans didn't intend for many people to be coming through here. The apparent exits waver slightly as if they are only temporary.

North.description: The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it.

South.description: The entrance wavers slightly as you look at it.

rooms.name: A Plain Room
rooms.description: This room is very plain, and only has two features that you can see. The first is a hole in the centre of the floor which has a pattern engraved around it, and the second is a stone arch.

Down.description: You can't see much through here, hints of colour seem to shift in the darkness.

extras.text: The pattern around the hole doesn't seem to be very regular on close inspection. Perhaps it's actually a spell of some sort?
You wander around it and it just seems like a doorway that is missing its door.

rooms.name: The Calm Room
rooms.description: This room is uncannily clean given the state of the rest of the town, and seems to radiate a calmness that suffuses your body and makes you want to smile for no reason.

rooms.name: The Phoenix Nest
rooms.description: This room is quite small and is almost totally taken up by a nest.  You think it strange that Rana would keep a bird as a pet as he seems more of a cat person.

rooms.name: Rana Theroxa's Office
rooms.description: This is a large well-appointed office with tasteful decorations and a sizeable desk.  There is a door to the south which has a couple of empty coat-hooks on it, and a small door to the north.

rooms.name: Nordus Holding Room
rooms.description: This is the holding room for Nordus things.
